channel.title: Roatz Pkz
channel.description:
[CENTER]LINK: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/qsdl109ib8ltcj4/RoatzPKz.zip]PACKAGE DOWNLOAD[/url]
I am sigmax on r-s
[SIZE=5]What has been done so far[/SIZE][/COLOR] - Npc Placement - Donator Package Interface - Zoom in/Zoom Out - Alert notification - Skill Tab - Spawn Tab - Help Tab - Shops - BlackMarks - Kills/Deaths - Staff Online - Better Pk Points System - Donator Points - New Login Screen with remember me function - Donator icon[$] - Overload - Combat is a lot better now. - Donator Items + zone - Models Fixed - Portal Interface - ::item with restrictions - All spawn sets are done. - 5 Pk Points a kill - Custom Capes - Donator Zone - Custom Npc's - New Special Bars [COLOR="#FF0000"]- 508 Maps - Bounty Hunter - Change Home to bounty hunter - Focus on Bh/PvP[/COLOR]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/vHjg6Vc.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/fdTeWIj.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7Ws2XLf.png[/img]

[img]http://cdn.makeagif.com/media/8-31-2013/guoeb1.gif[/img]
[img]http://cdn.makeagif.com/media/8-31-2013/5l8ZWq.gif[/img]
[img]http://img859.imageshack.us/img859/9060/capes.gif[/img]
[spoiler=random] [img]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/4787/9eqf.png[/img]
I know the video sucks but i put this together in like 5 minutes. It is just to show my combat. And the lag caused my fail at switching. In game the switching is absolutely flawless
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3B4fSO7mrlA&feature=youtu.be]Dds Specz Roatz Remake Pk video 2 - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yokw_TtfvNI]Roatz Remake Pk Video - YouTube[/url]
Be sure to thank and rep.
[SIZE=6]NOTE: I HAVE FULL PERMISSION TO REALEASE THIS AND I WILL GET PROOF IN A BIT. I DO NOT GIVE ANYONE PERMISSION TO RELEASE THIS ANYWHERE ELSE BUT HERE. ALSO I DO NOT GIVE PERMISSION TO ANYONE TO HELP ANYONE ELSE WITH THE SIMPLE ANTI-LEECH[/SIZE]/CENTER]
